bibl.title: A Provisional Translation of the Derveni Papyrus.
bibl.note: Translation of the text as it is currently available. K. TSANTSANOGLOU checked a preliminary version of the translation and communicated a number of suggestions based upon his own supplements to the papyrus.
bibl.seg: LAKS André and Glenn W. MOST, A Provisional Translation of the Derveni Papyrus.
André LAKS and Glenn W. MOST (Edd.), Studies on the Derveni Papyrus (Oxford, 1997) pp. 10-22.
